verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5117>left,<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by them, <S%H853>even<s%> as <S%H3605>many<s%> <S%H834><s%> of Israel as had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4421>wars<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan;<s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H1755>generations<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> might <S%H3045>know,<s%> to <S%H3925>teach<s%> them <S%H4421>war,<s%> at the <S%H7535>least<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> thereof;

Namely, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H6722>Sidonians,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H1179>Baal-hermon<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the entering <S%H935>in<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath.<s%>

And they <S%H1961>were<s%> to <S%H5254>prove<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by them, to <S%H3045>know<s%> whether they would <S%H8085>hearken<s%> <S%H853>unto<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1>fathers<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and Jebusites: <S%H2983><s%>

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to be their <S%H802>wives,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to their <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7911>forgot<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%> and the <S%H842>groves.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>hot<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and he <S%H4376>sold<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3573>Cushan-rishathaim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia:<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3573>Cushan-rishathaim<s%> <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> raised <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H3467>deliverer<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who <S%H3467>delivered<s%> them, <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz,<s%> <S%H3612>Caleb's<s%> <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4421>war:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3573>Cushan-rishathaim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H763>Mesopotamia<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5810>prevailed<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3573>Cushan-rishathaim.<s%>
And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%> And <S%H6274>Othniel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%> <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> they had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> and <S%H6002>Amalek,<s%> and <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of palm <S%H8558>trees.<s%>

So the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

But when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> raised them <S%H6965>up<s%> a <S%H3467>deliverer,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H261>Ehud<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> a <S%H1121>Benjamite,<s%> <S%H1145><s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H334>left-handed:<s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H3225><s%> and by <S%H3027>him<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4503>present<s%> unto <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

But <S%H261>Ehud<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him a <S%H2719>dagger<s%> which had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6366>edges,<s%> of a <S%H1574>cubit<s%> <S%H753>length;<s%> and he did <S%H2296>gird<s%> it <S%H4480>under<s%> <S%H8478><s%> his <S%H4055>raiment<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

And he <S%H7126>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4503>present<s%> unto <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%> and <S%H5700>Eglon<s%> was a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1277>fat<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

And <S%H834>when<s%> he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4503>present,<s%> he sent <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H4503>present.<s%>

But <S%H1931>he<s%> himself turned <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H6456>quarries<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were <S%H854>by<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> I have a <S%H5643>secret<s%> <S%H1697>errand<s%> unto thee, O <S%H4428>king:<s%> who <S%H559>said,<s%> Keep <S%H2013>silence.<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> by him went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him.

And <S%H261>Ehud<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him; and <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in a <S%H4747>summer<s%> <S%H5944>parlor,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had for himself <S%H905>alone.<s%> And <S%H261>Ehud<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> I have a <S%H1697>message<s%> from <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee. And he <S%H6965>arose<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H3678>seat.<s%>

And <S%H261>Ehud<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2719>dagger<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> and <S%H8628>thrust<s%> it into his belly: <S%H990><s%>

And the <S%H5325>haft<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3851>blade;<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H5462>closed<s%> <S%H1157>upon<s%> the <S%H3851>blade,<s%> so <S%H3588>that<s%> he could <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8025>draw<s%> the <S%H2719>dagger<s%> out of his <S%H4480>belly;<s%> <S%H990><s%> and the <S%H6574>dirt<s%> came <S%H3318>out.<s%>

Then <S%H261>Ehud<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> through the <S%H4528>porch,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H5944>parlor<s%> upon <S%H1157>him,<s%> and <S%H5274>locked<s%> them.

When <S%H1931>he<s%> was gone <S%H3318>out,<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came;<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H5944>parlor<s%> were <S%H5274>locked,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H5526>covereth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7272>feet<s%> in his <S%H4747>summer<s%> <S%H2315>chamber.<s%>

And they <S%H2342>tarried<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they were <S%H954>ashamed:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H5944>parlor;<s%> therefore they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H4668>key,<s%> and <S%H6605>opened<s%> them: and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> their <S%H113>lord<s%> was fallen <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H261>Ehud<s%> <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> they <S%H4102>tarried,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>beyond<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6456>quarries,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> unto <S%H8167>Seirath.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when he was <S%H935>come,<s%> that he <S%H8628>blew<s%> a <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H7291>Follow<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me: <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> And they went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and <S%H5414>suffered<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to pass <S%H5674>over.<s%>

And they <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%> at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> about <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H8082>lusty,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor;<s%> and there <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H376>man.<s%>

So <S%H4124>Moab<s%> was <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> him <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8044>Shamgar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6067>Anath,<s%> which <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853>of<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> with an <S%H1241>ox<s%> <S%H4451>goad:<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3467>delivered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
